item.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
item.description:
Wow. I have just not watched many movies this year. I really should work on that.

So let’s start with one of the weirdest and violent musicals out there: Sweeney Todd. I recently came across a YouTube video How the Music Spoils Sweeney Todd (and why that’s a good thing) that reminded me how much I enjoyed the music when we did it in high school (Not even kidding, not sure how that got approved…). So back we go to the 2007 Tim Burton / Johnny Depp version.

item.title: Skyfall
item.description: In the past few years, I’ve watched each of the previous Bond films at least twice, once in a semi-random order as they came up and then again in sequential order. So when I say that Skyfall was both more of a Bond film than either of the previous two Daniel Craig films, yet still not really a Bond film at all, that’s the basis I’m coming from.
